sig_info: Whenever a Critical Hit occurs for either player, there's a 16 to 85% chance the Scarlet Witch triggers her chaos magic, generating 0 - 8 Buffs or Debuffs.

Duckslug Editorial
Once chaos magic has been triggered, each of the 8 buffs or debuffs have varying independent chances to activate. Approximiately 12% for each (independent trials), with Regen and Stun at half that.
Offensive
Fury, Cruelty, Power Lock, Power Steal, Regen, Armor Opponent, Weakness, Stun
Defensive
Armor, Fatigue, Heal Block, Power Drain (Both), Power Gain, Poison, Fury Opponent, Weakness

CRITICAL HITS: Critical Hits have a 90% chance to Nullify, removing 1 Buff(s) from the opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack receives 1066.67 additional Critical Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack receives 1955.56 additional Critical Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to Nullify, removing all positive status effects from opponents.
